"A.P.242/3/20 10:00": "Stratos... you've been acting rather fidgety for some time. Is something up ahead?"
"N-nobody's waiting up there or anything! C'mon, let's go get that mission done!"

"...Kyo?! That was really dangerous...!
What if you'd hurt her?"
"...Silence. I am grateful to you for luring her out here, but I have no further use for you."
"Wh-, What are you saying? Weren't you going to make up with Lucotte?"
"To apologize for the cookies... or tell her you're happy she came back... Something like that?"
"Heheheh... Have you forgotten? A Phantom will use any means at hand to fulfill their goal... do not forget again."
"Lucotte... You will tell us everything. Everything you have been hiding from us."
"Stop, please! Lucotte came back... That's good enough for me!"
"I told you to stay silent. Come, Lucotte. Speak... Tell us the reason for your betrayal!"
"You leave me no choice... I will settle things myself. The Gate of Truth shall be opened...!"
"This is how he does things...? You want me to just watch?"
"I-, I am sorry! I apologize if I have upset you...!"
"Your groveling is unnecessary. No matter the cost, I shall wrench the truth out of you myself."
"Stop it, Kyo! You're just hurting everyone!"
"Stratos... Do not waver in the face of pain. Do not shy from causing others pain."
"Whether the truth harms you, or anyone else... The wounds will fade, and leave behind an even stronger bond!"
"The reason you will not speak... Could you be trying to protect us from some cruel truth?"
"Your actions are misguided. No understanding can be reached without explanation... Have more faith in yourselves!"
"Kyo... you're right! Luco! You have to believe in us!"
"We're your friends! If you can't talk to us... who can you?"
"B-, but... I cannot! No matter what...!"
"The reason why you locked us in that mansion, and set it ablaze!"
"Locked you in a mansion... And set fire...?"
"What...? Feigning ignorance of your own actions..."
"I am not feigning! What are you talking about, Kyo!"
"Of course not! I only invited you to the mansion to offer my hospitality...!"
"Luco, tell us everything! That day you called us out there... What happened?"
"We won't back down no matter what you say, we'll always believe in you!"
